fields.label: Flex Content
fields.name: flex_content
fields.instructions: Add a section of flexible content to the page

fields.label: Provider Modal Video
fields.name: provider_modal_video
fields.instructions: This video will open in a pop up modal window after clicking "Watch Video" under the providers bio.

fields.label: Provider Title
fields.name: provider_title
fields.instructions: Select all titles that apply to the provider.

fields.label: Patient Quote
fields.name: patient_quote
fields.instructions: Patient Testimonial displayed at the bottom of the page. Do NOT include quotations in this box.

fields.label: Relationship
fields.name: provider_relationship
fields.instructions: Select all site content related to this provider

fields.label: Doctors with this Specialty
fields.name: doctors_specialty
fields.instructions: Please select all providers with this Specialty

fields.label: Phone Event Tracking
fields.name: phone-event
fields.instructions: Use Google Analytics to track who clicks on the phone number. Use the sample below and edit the fields in [brackets] to match your values created in the Google Analytics > Admins > Goals > Event Tracking Dashboard.

fields.label: Header Code
fields.name: google_search_console
fields.instructions: Paste any code or script that needs to load in the header of the website here (Google Search Console, Google Fonts, Facebook Timeline, Tracking codes, Call Rail, etc.)

fields.label: Footer Code
fields.name: google_analytics
fields.instructions: Place Google Analytics Tracking code or any other script that needs to load in the footer of the website. This content is not visible on the website.

fields.label: Enable Homepage Slideshow
fields.name: slideshow_home
fields.instructions: Show or hide the homepage slideshow.

fields.label: Slideshow Shortcode
fields.name: slideshow_shortcode
fields.instructions: Paste the slideshow [short-code] in the text field above.

fields.label: Enable First Parallax Section
fields.name: parallax_first
fields.instructions: Show or hide the homepage content and sidebar section.

fields.label: Home Content
fields.name: home_content
fields.instructions: Show or hide the homepage content and sidebar section.

fields.label: Home Content Sidebar
fields.name: home_content_sidebar
fields.instructions: Show or hide the homepage content sidebar.

fields.label: Enable Second Parallax Section
fields.name: parallax_second
fields.instructions: Show or hide the homepage content and sidebar section.

fields.label: Home Widgets
fields.name: home_widgets
fields.instructions: Show or hide three footer widgets on home page only. Appearance>Widgets>Home Widgets (Left, Middle, Right)

fields.label: Footer Widgets
fields.name: footer_widget
fields.instructions: Show or hide three footer widgets on every page of the site. Appearance>Widgets>Footer Widgets (Left, Middle, Right)
